original_text: I always did what was right, like good clothes that I wore. I was fair and honest, like my coat and my hat. 29: Job is saying that he would not forget to dress himself in good clothes. In the same way, he would always remember to do what was right and honest. I always did what was right,
korean_text: 내가 의를 옷으로 삼아 입었으며 나의 정의는 겉옷과 모자 같았느니라

sentences.original_text: I always did what was right
like good clothes that I wore
like my coat and my hat
Job is saying that he would not forget to dress himself
sentences.korean_translation: 욥은 자신이 옷을 입는 것을 잊지 않을 것이라고 말한다

sentences.original_text: he would always remember to do what was right and honest
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 항상 옳고 정직한 일을 하려는 것을 기억할 것이다

sentences.original_text: I always did what was right
